channel.title: Thoughts on Abigail Elizabeth Alpern
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on Abigail Elizabeth Alpern

item.title: Testing My Website
item.description: I am now testing my website. Thanks for looking at my first post! We have a long way to go, but I’m excited to see where this goes! Credit to my amazing boyfriend, Mikhail, for teaching me everything I needed to know to put this together. I couldn’t have done this without him! He made this process fun and exciting instead of boring and confusing. I owe it all to him!
